resources.string: Do you want to learn about c:geo?\nCheck our easy to read manual.
Translate may fail with large amounts of text.
Unable to contact Geocaching.com. The website may be down or your Internet connection not working.
c:geo can\'t log in. c:geo works offline with Stored caches. Check your Login settings or enable Internet connection.
Geocaching.com is down for maintenance. c:geo works offline with Stored caches.
You have not agreed to Geocaching.com license agreement, so c:geo can\'t load cache coordinates.
This Cache is only available to Geocaching.com Premium Members.
c:geo can\'t display the geocache you want. Is it really a geocache?
c:geo forgot which geocache you want.
c:geo forgot which cache you visited.
c:geo failed to download static maps. Maybe google maps limit is reached.
c:geo found no spoiler images for this cache.
c:geo found no static maps for this cache.
c:geo failed to load static maps.
c:geo failed to load static maps. Store now?
c:geo can\'t find any supported navigation.
c:geo can\'t find any suitable application.
c:geo failed to initialize authorization process.
c:geo is unable to log your visit. Please log your visit from full cache details screen.
c:geo failed to load cache list.
c:geo failed to download cache details.
c:geo doesn\'t know location of cache.
Please enter a device name before registering.
c:geo can\'t display trackable you want. Is it really a trackable?
c:geo failed to download trackable details.
c:geo forgot which trackable you want.
c:geo forgot which trackable you saw.
c:geo doesn\'t know to which cache you want to add waypoint.
c:geo forgot what waypoint you want to display.
c:geo failed to add your waypoint.
c:geo can\'t recognize where you are.
Fill at least latitude or longitude or distance and bearing. You can also fill all four fields.
c:geo still doesn\'t have current coordinates. Please, wait a while…
Fill both bearing and distance. Bearing is angle 0 to 360 degrees relative to north. Distance with or without units.
c:geo can\'t get location of waypoint.
c:geo can\'t load data required to log visit.
c:geo can\'t load data required to log visit. Trying again.
c:geo is still loading data required to post log. Please wait a little while longer.
c:geo failed to post log because server is not responding.
It seems that your log was not posted. Please check it on Geocaching.com.
c:geo forgot the address you tried to find.
c:geo can\'t parse latitude or longitude.
There is nothing to be saved.
There is no cache with coordinates.
Enter an address or location name. For example use a postal address \"Radlicka 100, Prague, Czech Republic\", a city name \"Berlin\" or just a name of something like \"Yellowstone Park\".
Enter the code for a geocache. For example \"GC1VCAZ\".
Enter all or part of a geocache name. For example \"Night Cache\".
Enter the code for a trackable. For example \"TB29QMZ\".
Please fill in text for your log.
The selected map file is not a valid mapsforge version 0.3.0 map file.\nOffline maps are not available.
You are using a deprecated version 0.2.4 map file.\nConsider switching to a version 0.3.0 map.\nWe will drop support for version 0.2.4 in the next release.
The selected map file does not exist.\nOffline maps are not available.
Type of log has been changed!
Didn\'t find any geocode in the scan result.
Do you want to remove selected caches from device?
Do you want to remove all caches from current list?
Please, write text from image. It\'s important to download coordinates of caches. It\'s optional and can be switched off in Settings.
c:geo failed to create new list
Do you want to remove the current list of caches? All caches remaining in the list will be moved to \"Stored\".
c:geo failed to remove current list
Publish status when a cache has been found
Enter your signature to use it in the log text.\nSpecial strings that can be used are: [DATE] , [TIME], [DATETIME], [USER] & [NUMBER].\nThese will be expanded when the signature is inserted.
Load additional logbook page for logs from friends
Open details with last used page
Show CAPTCHA if necessary (only Basic Member)
Use English language for c:geo\n(Restart needed)
If less than the given amount of caches are displayed on the map, their waypoints are shown additionally.
Store cache static maps for offline use
Store waypoints static maps for offline use
Use Imperial Units instead of Metric Units
Enable Offline Logging\n(Don\'t show online Log screen when logging, don\'t send the Log online)
Show Direction to caches in the list
If your GPS is calculating a wrong altitude, you can correct it with a positive or negative number. The correction always has to be given in meters.
Please note, that this option will backup or restore the database containing caches and waypoints, but not your settings.\nYour Login data or passwords will never leave this application.
Database of c:geo was successfully copied to the file
Backup of database of c:geo failed.
Database is empty, no backup necessary.
Database is empty. Do you want to restore the database backup?
There is no file with a backup.

Here you can select the source for your maps. As an alternative to Google maps various OpenStreetMap styles are available and even offline map files (See http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/ for details).
Set trackables to \"Visited\" as a default
Load direction-image if necessary (only Basic Member)
Here you can select your preferred navigation tool.
Here you can select your second preferred navigation tool. It\'s activated by long clicking the navigation icon next to the title of the cache.

c:geo can generate a lot of debugging information. While this information is generally not useful for c:geo users, developers may need to generate this information in order to analyze a bug. In this case, they will ask you to check the box below and send them the log file.

You may store the database of c:geo on the external storage medium. If you do so you will save internal memory, but you may loose a bit of performance and c:geo will not work if your sdcard is not available.

Send2cgeo allows you to receive caches directly from the geocaching site using a special plugin for Firefox or Chrome. Before registration please read http://send2.cgeo.org/. You only need to register if you want to use send2cgeo. c:geo will work normal even without registering your device.
Registering your device for "Send to c:geo"…
Registration successful. PIN code is ####. Use it on c:geo website to add this device to your browser.
c:geo failed to download caches. No internet connection or send2c:geo is down.
c:geo failed to download caches. Registration for send2c:geo expired. Please register in settings.
Please type in PIN code provided by the Twitter website. It is mandatory to complete the authorization.
c:geo is now authorized to post on Twitter.
Description contains table formatting which may need to be viewed at geocaching.com to be seen correctly.
This cache is on your watchlist.
This cache is not on your watchlist.
This cache is one of your favorites.
This cache is not one of your favorites.

No files found in default folders:
%1$s

Searching whole SD card for files:
Do you want to import the GPX file into c:geo?
Waiting for new caches from web…
Since c:geo is able to download only partial data, coordinates of caches could be inaccurate.

On the new live map coordinates may not always be precise. Possibly imprecise coordinates are marked by an orange circle.
Opening the cache details or saving the cache for offline use will always obtain precise coordinates.

More information on all changes can be found on the "About c:geo" page inside the app.
In the hands of the owner
Comprehensive manual for c:geo that contains description of all possibilities of this application (even hidden ones).
Enables you to export event caches into the calendar on your device.
Simple usable application showing Online maps and allowing to download them directly into Offline mode (raster maps only). Also support track recording, POI handling and many other useful functions.
You can use radar from this application with c:geo. It also offers a lot of other GPS-related information.
Allows you to use an external GPS receiver to get more precise location and can spare battery of your device.
There are Greasemonkey scripts and websites which allow to display a geocode as barcode. With this app c:geo can read that geocode directly from the screen of your computer.
Get it now from Google Play.
Field Notes will be exported into /sdcard/field-notes with current date and time as file name.
Access or parking fee not required
To use the services of Geocaching.com, terms and conditions of the Groundspeak disclaimer have to be agreed.
To make geocaching easier, to make users lazier.

The service Go 4 Cache shows other geocachers on the map (in c:geo or in their browser) in real time. It can show - for example - what cache they are searching for. By connecting to Go 4 Cache c:geo is allowed to publish your current location when geocaching (only while c:geo is running).
Should c:geo publish a new status on Twitter every time you log a cache?
The following process allows c:geo to access Twitter - if agreed.

A click on the \"authorize c:geo\" button will start the process. This process will open up a web browser with a Twitter page. Login on this page and allow c:geo to access your account. If this is accepted, Twitter will show up a numeric PIN code. This PIN must be pasted into c:geo and confirmed. That\'s all.
New nightly build available.\nClick to install.
New release candidate available.\nClick to install.
Recent changes on geocaching.com broke c:geo.\nWe are working on it, check again soon.
Recent changes on geocaching.com broke the live map feature.\nWe are working on it, check again soon.

 · Mapsforge (OSM-rendering)
 · The Noun Project (basis for attribute icons)
 · The Apache Commons Project
 · Android Icons (CC-BY 3.0)
 · RRZE Icon set (CC-BY-SA 3.0)

Next release

 New Features/Functions:
 · Add/remove cache to/from Favorites
 · Export caches as GPX file
 · Filter for D/T in lists
 · Allow close of popup by click on map
 · Support of v0.3.0 mapsforge offline maps
 · Sorting of caches by store date
 · New popup for waypoints on live map
 · On-demand download of static maps
 · Upload fieldnotes to geocaching.com
 · Optionally move stored data to sd-card
 · Display time since last log on TB page
 · Popup on live map will give more details for unsaved caches
 · View all caches from different lists at once
 · Notification to user in case of new version, disturbances and similar occasions
 
 Bugfixing:
 · Static maps download for waypoints now off by default
 · Waypoints on map do no longer disappear when moving map
 · Static map download improved
 · Distance information in nearby search corrected
 · Adaption to changes on geocaching.com
 · Warning displayed for incompatible or outdated map files
 · No change of font color in selection mode
 · List layout optimized for most efficient screen usage
 · Watchlist status shown correct
 · Faster reaction when opening popup on map
 · Hiding of found/owned caches on map corrected
 · Show all stored caches on map (limit of 500 caches removed)
 · Position marker now shown above cache icons
 · Wrong cache size in cache details corrected
 · Display coordinates embedded in a log
 · Circles on map still shown after orientation change
 · A lot of translation improvements
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 Fast mode only detectes Tradi, Multi, Mystery, Event caches
 · Other:
 Log images with huge size cause a long loading time
 Recursively opening several instances of the map can cause a crash


 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
